00038   {
00039    unsigned short type;
00040    void *value;

00043 struct multifield
00044   {
00045    unsigned busyCount;
00046    short depth;
00047    long multifieldLength;
00048    struct multifield *next;
00049    struct field theFields[1];
00050   };
00051 
00052 typedef struct multifield SEGMENT;
00053 typedef struct multifield * SEGMENT_PTR;
00054 typedef struct multifield * MULTIFIELD_PTR;
00055 typedef struct field FIELD;
00056 typedef struct field * FIELD_PTR;
00057 
00058 #define GetMFLength(target)     (((struct multifield *) (target))->multifieldLength)
00059 #define GetMFPtr(target,index)  (&(((struct field *) ((struct multifield *) (target))->theFields)[index-1]))

00061 #define SetMFValue(target,index,val)  (((struct field *) ((struct multifield *) (target))->theFields)[index-1].value = (void *) (val))

00063 #define GetMFValue(target,index)  (((struct field *) ((struct multifield *) (target))->theFields)[index-1].value)
